home.title: Bem-vindo!
home.text1: Eu sou André Lusegardis Miranda de Oliveira.

about.title: About
about.text1: I'm a developer focused in the front-end, my speciality being web development, the coding I'm use to work with are: NextJS, ReactJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP.
about.text2: Since I was a kid, I always dreamed about being a developer, making my owns softwares. As the years gonne by, with me putting lots of efforts and time to make my dreams come true, I made it true and became a developer.
about.text3: Today here I am with my diploma (Bachelor's degrees in information systems), lot's of systems developed and this site of my own making.
about.text4: Among my main hobbies are: Developing; Watching series, animes, youtube; Gaming on PC, consoles and tabletop RPG; Reading romances, some of the books I loved are Harry Potter, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, Eragon, The Walking Dead.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.warning: Click on any project to know more about it!
